00000000000000000000000000001010 Increment
00000000000000000000000000000101 The jump is taken here.
00000000000000000000000000000110 6 is the index, remember the instructions (in this emulator) are 0-indexed when parsed.
00000000000000000000000000001010
00000000000000000000000000001010
00000000000000000000000000001010
00000000000000000000000000001010 It will end up here, and execute this instruction and the following.
